name: Green House (Itizso)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.6a Details Title Green House Model No. GH-54 Series Game & Watch ( Multi Screen ) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date December 6, 1982 Chipset Sharp SM511 ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

Protect flowers growing in a greenhouse from bugs in this multi-screen edition of Nintendo's Game & Watch series of handheld LCD games.

Gameplay

Flowers growing in a greenhouse are under attack from bugs. The busy fumigator must use his spray gun to kill the bugs and protect the flowers. Make sure no bugs reach the flowers or a miss will be scored. Three misses and the game is over.

The game is played over two screens. Use the UP and DOWN controls to climb the ladder. There are different kinds of bugs on each screen.

  • Spiders
    On the lower screen spray the spiders to move them one step backwards. Spray a spider when it is closest to a flower and it will be killed earning extra points.
     
  • Worms
    On the upper screen spray the inchworms to kill them instantly. Score more points for killing an inchworm the closer it is to a flower.
Controls Keyboard Up W or Up Arrow Down S or Down Arrow Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Spray Ctrl or Enter Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel Resources Audio David Haywood ( youtube.com ) Box Art Nintandbox ( nintandbox.net ) Instructions Torsten Lindh ( intheattic.co.uk ) Textures Lee Robson ( progettosnaps.net )
